provider.selectSQL: SELECT CASE WHEN s.recordId >= 2147483646 THEN NULL ELSE s.recordId END recordId1, cast (s.waybillNumber as varchar(15)) + ' (бланк_№'+www.formnumber+')' waybillNumber, CAST(s.garageNumber AS CHAR(10))+' '+t.model model, t.registrationNumber, CASE WHEN s.recordId = 2147483647 THEN 'ИТОГО :' WHEN s.recordId = 2147483646 THEN '= ИТОГО ПО СТРАНИЦЕ =' ELSE e.LastName+' '+e.FirstName+' '+e.MiddleName END fio, isNull(e.Department,'')+' '+ isNull(e.EmployeeNumber,'') zextab, s.quantity, CASE WHEN s.recordId >= 2147483646 THEN NULL ELSE '____________' END + CASE WHEN correctionId IS NULL THEN '______' ELSE '/корр.'+CAST(correctionId AS CHAR(8))+'/' END sign FROM getWaybillsRefuellingSheet(0{_sheet}, 8, {_page}) s LEFT JOIN Vehicle t ON t.garageNumber =s.garageNumber and t.ownerId = 1 left join Waybill www on www.WaybillId = s.waybillnumber LEFT JOIN Driver d ON d.driverId = s.driverId left join Employee e on e.EmployeeId = d.EmployeeId WHERE RefuellingId = 4 ORDER BY s.recordId
